thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 19 of 3563
thread.title: Crystal M
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by Crystal M

author: Crystal M
title: Crystal M
text: I was skeptical at first because I usually do not try new websites out, and honestly thought this was a scam or something. But I ordered all of my books for class and they all arrived!!! yes, some have writing in them but they are used books so its to be expected. you can choose the condition of the books. shipping is free after 10 dollars too so thats amazing.i have ordered about 20 books from thriftbooks and got every single one within the 14 days! some took 2 and some took 10 days so be patient. they will come in multiple orders sometimes!
